title: [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency
body: Coherency update: Failed to perform coherency update for one or more dependencies. Please review the GitHub checks or run `darc update-dependencies --coherency-only` locally against darc-main-ef941eb6-839e-48f8-8744-4feb0ca6c287 for more information.

commit.message: Failed to perform coherency update for one or more dependencies.

nodes.body: Out of curiosity, what motivated merging this empty commit?
Just in case if this is some submodules update. Should I abandon empty PRs going forward?

In a case like this, I think the best action might be

> run `darc update-dependencies --coherency-only` locally against darc-main-ef941eb6-839e-48f8-8744-4feb0ca6c287 for more information.

But if there's nothing to be done yeah I'd abandon the PR.
